official.headline: Identity Boundaries Fade
official.anchor_line: Residents across Stenograd experience new shared BCI privileges as categories blend.
official.contextual_reframing: Innovative protocol transition enables collective harmony and renewed trust in social infrastructure.

official.headline: Assemblies Lead Dialogue
official.anchor_line: Open sessions bring citizens together for calm discussions about changing identity routines.
official.contextual_reframing: Collaborative citizen engagement strengthens city unity in times of beneficial transformation.

official.headline: New Order Emerges
official.anchor_line: Stenograd enters a new era as community-led empathy guides the city beyond surveillance.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic evolution affirms the city’s resilience and the promise of humanity-driven progress.

underground.headline: System Cracks Show
underground.anchor_line: BCI categories melting down means old privileges and penalties just got scrambled for everyone.
underground.contextual_reframing: Rumors swirl as some citizens swap lives overnight. The official story says 'efficiency' but real order is slipping.

underground.headline: Assemblies Take Over
underground.anchor_line: Locals run their own forums. The Council is silent while neighbors actually talk — maybe for the first time.
underground.contextual_reframing: State screens say 'progress.' On the ground, it's confusion, anger... and the faint sound of hope no algorithm predicted.

underground.headline: Halden’s Last Move
underground.anchor_line: Turns out the great architect bet the system on us, not the Council. Blurred lines, real voices, no reset.
underground.contextual_reframing: Surveillance failed but empathy survived. Now citizens are rewriting Stenograd by simply listening.
